Package br.octahedron.cotopaxi.controller

Interface Summary
ControllerResponse Indicates an Controller's response
Converter<T> Default interface for type converters.
 

Class Summary
Controller The base class for Controllers and Middleware controller.
ControllerContext Holds the current context for a Controller.
ControllerDescriptor Describes a Controller.
ControllerExecutor This class is responsible by the controllers' execution and by gets the ControllerResponse for each request.
Converter.Builder Provide builder methods for built-in converters You should use this methods to get converters instead of create a new instance directly.
InputController A base class that provides access to input and output attributes for a controller, but can't render/redirect a response
 

Exception Summary
ControllerException Indicates an error on controller execution
ConvertionException Indicates that a convertion can't be done.
